title: Did a restaurant in New York refuse to serve a soldier in the United States?
subtitle: The social media bulletins claimed that Villagio in Masabkoa, New York, abandoned a military member because he visited the restaurant with a service dog.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: The New York pizza restaurant, Masabkoa, refused Villagio to serve a soldier named John Welch because he visited with a service dog.
